entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
